name: Eggs Away
description:
Help get the egg back in its nest while overcoming obstacles and using objects to assist you.

One stormy night a wild and turbulent wind blew the egg out of its nest. In order for the egg to hatch and grow into a bird, it needs your help to put it back in its nest. Just touch the Levels button to begin. Press and hold on the egg and drag back to control power and angle to launch it back into the nest. As the levels progress you will have obstacles that you will have to overcome in order to get the egg back in the nest.

+ Easy-to-learn controls and gameplay
+ Inventive obstacles
+ Colorful graphics
+ Physics based game
+ Fun and challenging for everyone
